reviews.review: Melhor jogo de puzzle.

Pareri despre joc:

Pozitive:
-merge pe majoriatatea pc-urilor
-un gameplay genial
-are limba romana introdusa automat
-e un joc puzzel foarte reusit
-mai unic din punctul meu de vedere
-merge bine la plictiseala

Negative:
-exista 2 locuri in care e super greu sa treci ( eu am folosit noclip)
-pretul cam mare ( cel mai bine cand e la reducere sa il cumperi)
-are mape bonus pentru viteza care sunt foarte greu de facut,pentru aur find aproape inposibil

Concluzie:
Merita incercat si adaugat in lista de jocuri pe care o ai
Es un buen juego que te puede quitar el aburrimiento este juego es altamente recomendado
引人入胜
虽然我玩的有点头晕，但这游戏真的太有趣了，关卡也不是很难，多观察思考就过关了
One of my favorite puzzle game. I do not need to talk anymore.

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!

It's hard to overstate
my satisfaction.

Aperture Science:
We do what we must
because we can
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying
over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
'til you run out of cake.
And the science gets done.
And you make a neat gun
for the people who are
still alive.

I'm not even angry...
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart,
and killed me.

And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!

Now, these points of data
make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD I got burned!
Think of all the things we learned!
for the people who are
still alive.

Go ahead and leave me...
I think I'd prefer to stay inside...
Maybe you'll find someone else
to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke. Ha Ha. Fat Chance!

Anyway this cake is great!
It's so delicious and moist!

Look at me: still talking
when there's science to do!
When I look out there,
it makes me glad I'm not you.

I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are
still alive.
And believe me I am
still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm
still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm
still alive.
While you're dying I'll be
still alive.
And when you're dead I will be
still alive

Still alive.

Still alive.

¡Portal!

Que mejor forma de comenzar una reseña con el mismo nombre del elemento en cuestión. Un viejo conocido, pero divertido e intuitivo, y que siempre da gusto jugar. Un excelente producto de Valve, sin duda alguna merece un lugar en tu Biblioteca de Steam. ¡Recomendado!
My second favorite game of all time after portal 2. Such great story and gameplay. 10/10 would recomend. Definitely on summer sale because it's like 2$ so it's a no brainer.
C'est un trés bon jeu malgré sa durée de vie, je le recomende mais conseil de le rendre avec portal 2.
Chell is hot

太优秀了。一个最简单的机制能幻化出这么丰富的玩法，谜题的难度也刚好，【3A的弱智解密玩多了很少动脑子了】
。更难能可贵的是还有剧情，Glados真的很萌，片尾曲就不提了。真的棒

我本身是AVG游戏爱好者，这种科幻题材的第一人称视角解谜实在很新颖，剧情可以说是短小精悍，游戏过程中好几个地方看得我心头一震，但是玩着犯晕真是太难受了。很少玩第一人称视角的游戏，准确地说是除了屁股先锋就没碰过第一人称的了，这毕竟是十年前的游戏，画面比起现在说是简陋也不过分，不知道是不是这个原因让我犯晕。我的妈呀第一次一口气玩了两小时，然后实在顶不住眩晕感离开电脑，人刚站起来直接趴地上了QAQ如果不是犯晕的话一口气玩通关体验一定极好，为了尽快通关中途查了三次攻略，感觉有点遗憾啊。

Fun prequel to Portal 2. It feels kinda like a ,,test`` game which is funny because you have to complete tests... you get that, right ? Anyways, the puzzles are fun to solve and the graphics are OK. It can basically run on any modern-day computers on low settings. Just the short amount of play time ( i completed all chambers in 2 hours ) is a bad thing. BUT I have to admit that you can play all levels again and get some medals and highscores. Definitely recommend it.
This game was very entertaining, i loved the gameplay, and glados was the best part, those credits were beautifull. Nice job valve.

Au début, je me sentais un peu coincé dans un espace parallèle circulatoire, un peu étourdi.Avec le jeu, on s' adapte peu à peu à ce sentiment.Quand vous utilisez la porte de transmission pour voir un autre monde qui vous ressemble, mes pensées sont bloquées, la vie est l 'expression de la philosophie.Le jeu est très plausible, l 'exécution de l' opération fantastique est attrayante, et la logique de l 'histoire est extrêmement effrayante.J 'avais envie de m' amuser un peu avant de dormir, comment le jour peut - il s' éclairer? C 'est un bon jeu.

Портал первый - это по-факту техно демка второго портала. В несколько раз короче,легче,меньше механик и шуток.
Хуже ли она своего "младшего брата"?-Да.
Плохая ли это игра-однозначно нет. Интересная механика порталов в симбиозе с головоломками средней сложности выдает просто отличный результат. Благодаря своей краткости игра не успевает надоедать. Пройти игру можно без проблем за час-два.
Рекомендую брать вместе со второй частью.

传送门1代是整个剧情的开始，讲述了女主角Chell在光圈科技建造的AI测试中，初次与逐渐失控的AI核心G姐斗智斗勇，最终打败它逃出生天（？）的故事。
我是在前年年初将传送门1通关的，两年半之后的今天终于是通关了传送门2，具体原因传送门2的评论会讲，通关之后，感慨万千，对于这个游戏，想要给没有体验过的朋友们说几句：
1.V社出品，必属精品；
2.剧情虽然不多，但是非常非常非常棒，传送门1和传送门2的剧情是承接关系，中途有一部分涉及了半条命系列的剧情，传送门1和传送门2之间的剧情前后时间大概是5w年，其余不再赘述。
3.传送门1代，相较于2代来说，游戏流程短，难度适中，很有新意，一路玩下去不会觉得很累，很舒服，推荐任意类型的（晕3D除外）玩家体验。
найс просто найс

It may just be that the humor is an exact fit for mine, but this was one of the most hilarious games I've ever played. Just amazingly good from a plot/naration standpoint and the game itself, the puzzles, the portals, are tons of fun. I really wish it were longer. Maybe a sequel!

O jogo é simplesmente incrível, acho fantástico como ele conseguiu me prender em tão pouco tempo, mesmo a mecânica sendo muito simples: você tem uma arma que atira dois portais, toda vez que os dois estão no mapa você consegue entrar em um e sair no outro.  Mesmo tendo apenas essa ferramenta os puzzles não enjoam, eles variam muito e conforme você avança, mais e mais mecânicas são adicionadas (caixas, pistões, plataformas), entre mais algumas outras. O único ponto negativo desse jogo  é a duração da campanha, a história é muito boa, mas acaba muito rápido. Por sorte seu sucessor, o Portal 2, corrigiu isso. De resto, esse é o único defeito que eu reparei mesmo, pois a história é muito bem contada, com direito a Plot Twist e tudo.

Bu oyunu o kadar seviyorum ki nereden başlayacağımı inanın bilmiyorum. Defalarca defalarca bitirdim. O kadar çok bitirmişimdir ki sırf ending müziği daha çok haz versin diye bitirdiğim olmuştur. Neyse Valve klasiği çok sevdiğim mükemmel bir oyunun ön ayağı, daha çok deneysel bir oyun kendisi. Asıl oyunun (Portal 2) fragmanı gibi bir şey gözümde. 

Özet geçmek gerekirse bir denek olarak başlıyoruz bir süre sonra GLaDOS'un iğneleyici sohbetleri başlıyor. Her yerde gördüğümüz "cake is a lie" lardan sonra zaten yolun ucunun hayırlı bir yere çıkmadığını anlıyoruz. Ondan sonrası da aksiyon bölümü oluyor zaten.
Wonderful and Charming and sometimes Eerie

Portal is a fun puzzle game which adds interesting mechanics which purposely confuses the player.
It is not very long.
It does not have a story.
It has little replayability.
However with that said, it is still a must buy especially at discount. 
Highly recommend.
